PlanOverview.description: This plan is based on the "{source}" template provided by {affiliationName}

page.requiredByFunderInfo: The funder has marked this as a required question on their template. You can leave it blank in the tool but should complete it before submitting your grant.
page.commentTooltip: You need to save an answer before users can comment.
page.participantsWillBeNotified: Participants will be notified once submitted.

relatedWorks.title: Related works for this plan
relatedWorks.publish: Publish your plan to start adding related outputs to your DMP

errors.invalidDmpId: Invalid DMP ID: The DMP ID provided is not valid.
errors.sectionNotFound: Section not found: This section does not belong to the current plan.

publish.title: Publish
publish.description1: Publishing a Data Management Plan (DMP) assigns it a Digital Object Identifier (DOI). By publishing, you'll be able to link this plan to your ORCiD, and to project outputs such articles which will make it easier to show that you met your funder's requirements by the end of the project.
publish.description2: This DOI uniquely identifies the DMP, facilitating easy reference and access in the future.
publish.checklistTitle: Before you publish your plan, we strongly recommend that you:
publish.visibilityDescription: Great, publishing your plan has many benefits.
publish.visibilityOptionsTitle: Set the visibility of your plan

public.label: Public (recommended)
public.description: All metadata will be visible to any user. Researchers will be able to view the contents of the plan itself.

organization.label: Organization only
organization.description: The full plan will be visible to anyone within your Organization. Only basic metadata about your plan (title and collaborators) will be visible to users outside your organization.

private.label: Private
private.description: Only basic metadata about your plan (title and collaborators) will be visible to other users.

checklistItem.percentageAnswered: have answered at least 50% of the questions (you answered {percentage}%)
checklistItem.orcidText: have designated the ORCiD for at least one of the

errors.updateTitleError: There was an error updating the plan title

PlanCreate.title: Plan: Select a DMP template
PlanCreate.description: Select a template to use when creating your DMP.

checkbox.filterByFunderDescription: Select if you want to only see templates by your funder or organization.
checkbox.filterByBestPracticesDescription: Select if you want to only see best practice templates

ProjectsProjectPlanAdjustMembers.title: Plan members
ProjectsProjectPlanAdjustMembers.description: Select the relevant members for this plan only from the list of project members shown below. Regardless of their role in this plan, they will remain as members of your

headings.h2MembersNotInPlan: Project members not in this plan
headings.h2AllowOthers: Allow others access to the project

ProjectsProjectPlanAdjustMembers.addProjectMemberInfo: You can add any project member to this plan using the tickboxes above. If you want to add someone who isn't shown here, you must add them to the project first.
ProjectsProjectPlanAdjustMembers.allowOthersToAccess: You can allow others access to the project. This will grant them access to the project and all plans.

success.addedPlanMember: Successfully added {fullName} as a plan member
success.removedPlanMember: Successfully removed {fullName} as a plan member
success.updatedPlanMember: Successfully updated {fullName} as a plan member

select.description: The primary contact is required, this will be the primary lead contact which will be used if a DOI is created

ProjectsProjectPlanFeedback.title: Request feedback
ProjectsProjectPlanFeedback.description: You can get feedback from University of California support team, please read the following message from the team.

form.label: Send message to University of California support team
form.placeholder: Can you review my plan for any mistakes

teamFeedback.title: Feedback from team members
teamFeedback.description: You can get feedback from team members by leaving comments

universitySupport.title: Feedback from the University Support Team
universitySupport.description: You can request feedback from your university's research support staff (such as data stewards, research facilitators, or librarians).
expertsCan: Check that your plan meets funder requirements
Suggest improvements to data storage, sharing, or ethical handling
Help you prepare a stronger, more compliant submission
universitySupport.requestInfo: To request their feedback and they'll be notified and will review your plan when available.

teamMembers.title: Feedback from Team Members
teamMembers.description: You can invite colleagues or collaborators to review your plan and leave comments directly on specific sections.
usefulWhen: You're co-authoring the plan with others
You want input from people familiar with your research or data
You'd like to clarify responsibilities or fill in any missing details
teamMembers.encourageInfo: Encourage your team to leave constructive comments or suggestions, this makes the collaborative process much smoother and ensures nothing is overlooked.

ProjectsProjectPlanDownloadPage.title: Download plan
ProjectsProjectPlanDownloadPage.description: You can download your Data Management Plan (DMP) in any of the formats listed below.
ProjectsProjectPlanDownloadPage.bestPracticep1: PDFs offer universal compatibility and preserve formatting across all devices and platforms, ensuring your document looks perfect every time - unlike Word documents. Choose PDF to guarantee a consistent, professional, and secure presentation for your documents. Plus, most Funders require that DMPs be submitted in PDF format.
ProjectsProjectPlanDownloadPage.bestPracticep2: If your organization, funder or project have specific requirements, you can also download your DMP in HTML, CSV or JSON formats.

ProjectsProjectPlanNew.title: Add a Data Management Plan to your project

labels.startNewPlan: Create a plan in the DMP Tool
labels.startNewOrUploadExisting: Would you like to create a new plan or upload an existing one?
